Dale wrote:
> I'm looking to test my app and would like to use both of thes=
e
> (JUnit / HTTPUnit with JavaScript)  Does anyone have any good
> example=
s of code that I can use.  It seems all of the links that
> people give me =
never really shows me any example code.

Hi Dale,

for JavaScript you have =
the choice between two implementations:
jsUnit from Edward Hieatt available=
 at http://sf.net/projects/jsunit or
JsUnit from me available at http://www=
.berlios.de/projects/jsunit

Edward's version is completly browser based an=
d might fit better if you want to test code based on actions in the DOM mod=
el, while my version is more strictly a JUnit port concentrating on funcion=
ality. Look to the project's homepages and delivery for examples.

Regards,=
